markdownRemark.html:
In this tutorial, we’ll walk you through how to set up a GitHub DID using the CLI and a local wallet to manage keys.

See the tutorial

Finally, head over to https://github-did.com/resolver and try to resolve your DID.

Congrats! You should now have a usable / resolvable DID to experiment with!

To learn how to use your keys / DID documents head over to the next article
